They include preferences, security, and basic site features.', analytics: 'These help us understand how visitors interact with our site, so we can improve it. All analytics are fully anonymous and optional.' }; const CookiePolicy = () => { const [showEssential, setShowEssential] = useState(false); const [showAnalytics, setShowAnalytics] = useState(false); return (
{/* Privacy-respecting banner */}
üõ°Ô∏è We use only privacy-respecting cookies to ensure your experience is safe and smooth. No trackers, ever.
{/* Title and Last Updated */}

üç™ Cookie Policy for Avyakta

Last updated: {getFormattedDate()} (updated automatically)

{/* Empathetic intro */}

At Avyakta, we believe that every soul deserves respect ‚Äî including yours. That's why we use only the most essential cookies to keep your visit smooth, secure, and private. No ads. No hidden tracking. Just clarity and compassion.

{/* What Are Cookies? */}

‚ÑπÔ∏è What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your experience, enhance security, and remember your preferences. We keep our use of cookies to the bare minimum needed to serve you better.

{/* Why We Use Cookies */}

üîç Why We Use Cookies

  • üîê Ensure website security and protection
  • üöÄ Improve site speed and performance
  • üåê Remember your language or accessibility preferences
  • üß† Help prevent spam or misuse (e.g., via reCAPTCHA)
  • üìä Track anonymous analytics data (non-personal, optional)
{/* What We Do NOT Use */}

‚ùå What We Do NOT Use

  • ‚úò Advertising cookies
  • ‚úò Third-party marketing trackers
  • ‚úò Any cookies that compromise your privacy
{/* Types of Cookies Table */}

üìã Types of Cookies We Use

{showEssential && ( )} {showAnalytics && ( )}
Type Info Purpose
üîß Essential Enable core site functionality, preferences, and security
{cookieTypeInfo.essential}
üìä Analytics (optional) Understand how users interact (fully anonymous, only if enabled)
{cookieTypeInfo.analytics}
{/* Third-Party Tools */}

üîó Third-Party Tools Used

  • Google reCAPTCHA (to prevent spam)
  • MongoDB Atlas (secured backend, doesn't use cookies)
  • Optional: Google Analytics (only if you enable it)
{/* Legal Compliance */}

üìú Legal & Privacy Commitment

We comply with privacy laws such as the GDPR, and are committed to protecting your dignity and data. We never sell or misuse your information. For more details, contact us at support@avyakta.org.

{/* Changes to Policy */}

üîÑ Changes to This Policy

We may update this Cookie Policy to reflect changes in legal or technical requirements. Updates will be posted here with the date above.

{/* User Choices */}

üõ†Ô∏è Your Choices

  • ‚úÖ Accept all cookies
  • ‚öô Adjust your browser settings to block or delete cookies
  • üîí Continue using the website without sharing personal info

Note: Some essential features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.
